announcements.title: Provincial Lockdown as of April 3rd, 2021 at 12:01am.
announcements.descriptive:
Daily Mass will continue to be offered at the Cathedral at 15% capacity. For Easter Masses, a priest will be available at the back of the church to offer Communion to those who are unable to enter.
We apologize for any inconvenience.

Parishioners are asked to review
[Worship Safe in Pictures and Points](http://peterboroughdiocese.org/en/resourcesGe…).

The televised Sunday Mass will continue on YouTube.
Check [Special events](#schedule2) below for information and links.

announcements.title: Easter Schedule
announcements.descriptive:
Holy Thursday, April 1st at 7:00pm at 30% capacity
Good Friday, April 2nd at 10:00am, 3:00pm & 5:00pm at 30% capacity.

Easter Vigil, April 3rd at 8:00pm at 15% capacity
Easter Sunday, April 4th at 7:30am, 9:00am, 10:30am & 12:00pm at 15% capacity.

announcements.title: Join our mailing list
announcements.descriptive:
Be the first to know!
Stay in the loop with everything going on at The Cathedral.

Sign up to receive regular updates, announcements, links to bulletins, and more,
delivered straight to your inbox!

Let's stay connected.

[Sign up...](https://mailchi.mp/ac8e8cadb5e8/dont-miss-out)
